attributes.action: Declare a climate emergency and prioritize the protection of life on earth
attributes.background: Over 35 thousand people died in the UK from air pollution last year and by 2050 10% of the world's population will be made refugee's due to rising sea levels and crop failure. There are only 12 years left before the impact is irreversible and our world is destroyed

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about climate change, but are not sure what exactly you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might also like to sign one of these petitions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234717
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231038
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231518
